main.title: Find Your Dream Job with Jumyste!
main.description: We connect talented individuals with the best companies. Be one of them!

info.title: Over 100 companies trust us - now it's your turn

ai.title: Hire Faster and Smarter with AI!
ai.description: How does the AI recruiter work?

info1.title: Analysis and Candidate Selection
info1.description: The AI scans resumes, analyzes experience, skills, and qualifications.

info2.title: Assessment and Ranking
info2.description: After selection, the AI ranks candidates based on job fit.

info3.title: Automated Communication
info3.description: AI helps with communication: sends notifications, interview invitations, and test assignments.

reviews.title: Transparent Employee Reviews
reviews.description: We value honest feedback from every team member. The Clear Feedbacks feature allows employees to share their impressions of the company, culture, work conditions, and development opportunities.
reviews.list1: Employees leave honest reviews. Management gains valuable insights.
reviews.list2: Management receives valuable insights to improve working conditions.
reviews.list3: Transparency helps create a comfortable work environment.

faq1.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq1.description: In this section, you will find information about how our service works, how to search for jobs, leave reviews, and much more. We've tried to answer everything that might interest you.

items.question: How does your service work?
items.answer: Our service uses artificial intelligence to match the best candidates with job openings. Just create a profile, add your information, and the system will find the best options for you.

items.question: How to search for a job?
items.answer: You can search for jobs using an easy-to-use filter, and also get recommendations based on your skills and experience.

items.question: How to leave a review?
items.answer: Just go to the company profile and leave your review. All reviews are moderated.

items.question: How to contact an employer?
items.answer: You can send a message to the employer directly through the platform after submitting your job application.
